text: Hello I'm Shayna I'm here to report for training Welcome I'm Gord I'm the warehouse supervisor Nice to meet you Gord thanks for taking the time to show me around Of course so for this quarter you'll be working in quality control are you familiar with this department Not exactly this is my first time working in a factory OK basically you'll be looking through the inventory and checking for defects Oh I actually thought I was going to be working on the assembly line Not quite Robots do most of the assembly work in this plant Robots interesting what do they do exactly Well they assemble and paint the parts however we use human workers to stock the products workers also inspect for defects before and after production I see well I'd love to see the robots in action at some point We can arrange that but it's a restricted area you need special permission to gain access Oh is that for safety reasons Yes safety is key around here you'll need some steel toe boots and a hardhat in fact a safety course is on the agenda for this afternoon Great I'm sure there's a lot to learn Yes the first there's some paperwork I need you to fill out I'll also show you the schedule so you know when to take your breaks
